title: About
body:
Contentstack Sync

What is Contentstack Sync

Contentstack Sync lets you sync your Contentstack data on your infrastructure. So, every time you publish, delete, or update data, it syncs the updated content with your server.

Why Use Contentstack Sync

  • Sync Contentstack data on your database server
  • Fetch data from your infrastructure, instead of Contentstack server through APIs
  • Reduced API calls to Contentstack server
  • Database-specific SDKs that provide flexible querying on the data
  • Flexibility to use your favorite framework or language with Contentstack Sync
